AT.name: Star Fox™ Zero: Der Kampf beginnt + Training
AT.description: „Star Fox Zero: Der Kampf beginnt“ ist ein kurzer Animationsfilm mit den beliebten Charakteren von Star Fox Zero in den Hauptrollen. Er entstand in Zusammenarbeit mit Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G und WIT STUDIO. Um dich auf den Kampf von Star Fox Zero vorzubereiten, kannst du außerdem vier Trainingsmissionen spielen! Arwing, Landmaster, Walker und Gyrowing sind erhältlich. Schließe dich in Star Fox Zero Fox, Falco, Peppy und Slippy im Kampf an, um das Lylat-System vor Andross' böser Armee zu beschützen!

AU.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
AU.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins is an animated short film starring the beloved characters from Star Fox Zero. It was produced in collaboration with Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G and WIT STUDIO. To prepare for the battle of Star Fox Zero, you can also play four training missions! The Arwing, Landmaster, Walker and Gyrowing are available. Join Fox, Falco, Peppy and Slippy as they fight in Star Fox Zero to protect the Lylat System from Andross’ evil army!

BG.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
BG.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins is an animated short film starring the beloved characters from Star Fox Zero. It was produced in collaboration with Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G and WIT STUDIO. To prepare for the battle of Star Fox Zero, you can also play four training missions! The Arwing, Landmaster, Walker and Gyrowing are available. Join Fox, Falco, Peppy and Slippy as they fight in Star Fox Zero to protect the Lylat System from Andross’ evil army!

BE.name: Star Fox™ Zero : Le combat commence + Entraînement
BE.description: Star Fox Zero : Le combat commence, est un court métrage d'animation avec les personnages les plus appréciés de Star Fox Zero. Il a été produit en collaboration avec Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G et WIT STUDIO. Pour vous préparer au combat de Star Fox Zero, vous pouvez aussi jouer à quatre missions d'entraînement ! Arwing, Landmaster, Walker et Gyrowing sont disponibles. Rejoignez Fox, Falco, Peppy et Slippy dans leur combat dans Star Fox Zero pour protéger le système Lylat des armées maléfiques d'Andross !

ES.name: Star Fox™Zero: Comienza el combate + Entrenamiento
ES.description: "Star Fox Zero: Comienza el combate" es un corto de animación protagonizado por los personajes más queridos de Star Fox Zero. Ha sido producido en colaboración con Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G y WIT STUDIO. Para prepararte para el combate de Star Fox Zero, ¡puedes jugar cuatro misiones de entrenamiento! El Arwing, Landmaster, Walker y Gyrowing están disponibles. ¡Únete a Fox, Falco, Peppy y Slippy en su lucha en Star Fox Zero para proteger el sistema Lylat del malvado ejército de Andross!

IT.name: Star Fox™ Zero: La battaglia ha inizio + Addestramento
IT.description: "Star Fox Zero: La battaglia ha inizio" è un corto animato che vede come protagonisti i personaggi di Star Fox Zero. È prodotto in collaborazione con Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G e WIT STUDIO. Per prepararti alla battaglia di Star Fox Zero, potrai partecipare a quattro missioni di addestramento! Sono disponibili l'Arwing, il Landmaster, il Walker e il Gyrowing. Unisciti a Fox, Falco, Peppy e Slippy nella loro battaglia in Star Fox Zero per proteggere il Sistema Lylat dall'armata di Andross!

NL.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
NL.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins is een korte animatiefilm met de geliefde personages uit Star Fox Zero. Deze is in samenwerking met Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G en WIT STUDIO tot stand gekomen. Om je op het gevecht van Star Fox Zero voor te bereiden kun je ook vier trainingsmissies spelen! De Arwing, Landmaster, Walker en Gyrowing zijn beschikbaar. Vecht mee met Fox, Falco, Peppy en Slippy in Star Fox Zero, om het Lylat System tegen het kwaadaardige leger van Andross te beschermen!

NZ.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training

PT.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
PT.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins é uma curta de animação protagonizada pelas adoradas personagens de Star Fox Zero. Foi produzida em colaboração com Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G e WIT STUDIO. Para te preparares para a batalha de Star Fox Zero, podes jogar quatro missões de treino! Tens disponíveis: The Arwing, Landmaster, Walker e Gyrowing. Em Star Fox Zero, junta-te a Fox, Falco, Peppy e a Slippy na luta para proteger o Lylat System do maligno exército de Andross!

RU.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
RU.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins — короткометражный анимационный фильм с участием любимых всеми персонажей игры Star Fox Zero, произведенный в сотрудничестве с Shigeru Miyamoto (Сигеру Миямото), Production I.G и WIT STUDIO. Чтобы подготовиться к сражениям в Star Fox Zero, вы сможете сыграть в тренировочные задания: The Arwing, Landmaster, Walker и Gyrowing! Уже в доступе! Помогите Фоксу, Фалько, Пеппи и Слиппи защитить систему Лайлет от зловещей армии Андросса в игре Star Fox Zero!

SE.name: Star Fox™ Zero: The Battle Begins + Training
SE.description: Star Fox Zero: The Battle Begins is an animated short film starring the beloved characters from Star Fox Zero. It was produced in collaboration with Shigeru Miyamoto, Production I.G and WIT STUDIO. To prepare for the battle of Star Fox Zero, you can also play four training missions! The Arwing, Landmaster, Walker and Gyrowing are available. Join Fox, Falco, Peppy and Slippy as they fight in Star Fox Zero to protect the Lylat System from Andross’ evil army!
